author: Harsh Chauhan
title: Fannie Mae’s Stellar U.S. Housing Market Prediction Could Be a Thumping Failure
description:
Fannie Mae expects the U.S. housing market to enjoy price growth in 2020, but the ill effects of coronavirus could defeat its prediction.
The post Fannie Mae’s Stellar U.S. Housing Market Prediction Could Be a Thumping Failure appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Fannie Mae predicts home prices to rise in 2020.
  • The coronavirus pandemic will be a big hurdle for the U.S. housing market.
  • Actual data from the ground suggest that prices have started falling.
